special: Mastodon instance by the owner of niu.moe. Tries to bring back all the old niu memories. Also with custom theme.

description: One of the first Mastodon instances, there is no specific topic we’re into, just enjoy your time!
special: Big generalist instance from Germany. One of the first few Mastodon instances.

description: ｃｙｂｒｅｓｐａｃｅ: the social hub of the information superhighway
moderation: Probably blocks known bad actors, don’t be stupid, tag your stuff etc.
special: Glitchy-hackery instance style. Can also count themselves to the “first few”

description: blob.cat, an instance for blobcats (blobfoxes are ok too)
moderation: Blocks instances that do active harm to their users, don’t be stupid, tag your stuff, etc.
special: Blobcat-themed Pleroma instance. Very friendly community.

description: A berserker's gateway to the Mastodon social network. Run by a Norwegian, with servers in Finland.
relaxed iceshrimp space for people who are fruity and sweet
special: Iceshrimp instance, queer-owned, very friendly community

description: Disqordia dot space is a queer, leftist, and anti-fascist fediverse instance run by a small collective of queer and trans users.
special: Akkoma instance in a very vibrant purple theme. Nice people over there as well.

description: A generalist Mastodon instance with a nice domain name. Running on Glitch Social's fork with a custom theme!
